data: It has for some ages been thought so wonderful a thing to sail the tour or circle of the globe, that when a man has done this mighty feat, he presently thinks it deserves to be recorded like Sir Francis Drakeâ€™s.
A New Voyage Round the World by a Course Never Sailed Before
